description: A startup script for managing the Vite development server. Handles process cleanup, port assignment, resource checks, and process monitoring to ensure reliable development server operation.

methods.name: log_info
methods.description: Logs informational messages with green color formatting.

methods.name: log_warn
methods.description: Logs warning messages with yellow color formatting.

methods.name: log_error
methods.description: Logs error messages with red color formatting.

methods.name: cleanup
methods.description: Performs cleanup by killing Vite and npm processes before exiting.

methods.name: check_port
methods.description: Checks if a specific port is available for use.

methods.name: find_available_port
methods.description: Iterates over a range of ports to find an available one.

methods.name: kill_existing_processes
methods.description: Terminates existing Vite and npm processes if running.

methods.name: check_system_resources
methods.description: Checks system memory and disk usage, performs garbage collection if needed.

methods.name: start_vite
methods.description: Starts the Vite process with process monitoring, restart logic, and resource considerations.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main entry point that coordinates the startup sequence for the development server.
